about.title: About TechHive Pakistan
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Electronics Partner in Rawalpindi, Connecting Technology with Pakistani Homes Since 2024

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Founded in the heart of Rawalpindi, Pakistan in 2024, TechHive Pakistan began as a dream to bridge the gap between cutting-edge technology and everyday Pakistani consumers. What started as a small electronics shop in Commercial Market has evolved into one of Pakistan's most trusted online electronics retailers.
ourStory.paragraph2: Our journey began when our founder, a software engineer from Iqra University Islamabad, noticed the challenges Pakistani consumers faced when trying to access genuine, high-quality electronics at fair prices. Long queues at physical stores, limited product availability, concerns about authenticity, and lack of proper after-sales support were common frustrations.
ourStory.paragraph3: We recognized that Pakistan's growing digital landscape needed a reliable electronics partner ‚Äì one that understood local needs, offered genuine products, provided excellent customer service in both Urdu and English, and delivered across the country with care and precision.
ourStory.paragraph4: Today, from our headquarters in Rawalpindi and our fulfillment centers across Punjab, we serve customers from Karachi to Gilgit, from Lahore to Quetta. We've successfully delivered over 50,000 orders and built a community of satisfied customers who trust us with their technology needs.

authenticity.title: Authenticity Guaranteed
authenticity.description: Every product we sell comes with a guarantee of authenticity. We work directly with authorized distributors and maintain strict quality control to ensure you receive only genuine electronics.

delivery.title: Nationwide Delivery
delivery.description: From Islamabad to Karachi, Lahore to Peshawar - we deliver across Pakistan with our reliable logistics network. Fast, secure, and trackable delivery to your doorstep.

support.title: Local Support
support.description: Our Pakistani customer support team understands your needs and speaks your language. Get help in Urdu, English, or Punjabi - we're here to assist you every step of the way.

prices.title: Best Prices
prices.description: We negotiate directly with suppliers to offer competitive prices. Regular sales, student discounts, and bulk purchase options ensure you get the best value for your money.

afterSales.title: After-Sales Service
afterSales.description: Our relationship doesn't end at delivery. We provide comprehensive warranty support, repair services, and technical assistance through our certified service centers.

technology.title: Latest Technology
technology.description: Stay ahead with the latest gadgets and electronics. We continuously update our inventory with cutting-edge products from leading international and local brands.

whatWeOffer.title: What We Offer
whatWeOffer.intro: Our extensive electronics catalog covers everything you need to stay connected, entertained, and productive in today's digital world:
whatWeOffer.mobilePhones: Mobile Phones & Accessories: Latest smartphones from Samsung, Apple, Huawei, Xiaomi, Oppo, Vivo, and local brands like QMobile. Complete range of cases, chargers, power banks, and mobile accessories.
whatWeOffer.computers: Computers & Laptops: Gaming laptops, business laptops, desktop computers, tablets, and all computer accessories. We stock products from HP, Dell, Lenovo, Acer, and Asus with local warranty support.
whatWeOffer.appliances: Home Appliances: Smart TVs, refrigerators, washing machines, air conditioners, kitchen appliances from trusted brands like Haier, PEL, Dawlance, Samsung, and LG.
whatWeOffer.gaming: Gaming & Entertainment: Gaming consoles, gaming accessories, headphones, speakers, home theater systems, and streaming devices for the ultimate entertainment experience.
whatWeOffer.smartHome: Smart Home & IoT: Smart speakers, security cameras, smart bulbs, home automation devices, and everything you need to create a connected home.

team.title: Our Team
team.paragraph1: Behind TechHive Pakistan is a dedicated team of technology enthusiasts, customer service experts, and logistics professionals who share a common goal: making technology accessible to every Pakistani household.
team.paragraph2: Our team includes experienced electronics engineers who curate our product selection, ensuring every item meets our quality standards. Our customer service representatives are trained not just in product knowledge but in understanding the diverse needs of Pakistani consumers across different regions and backgrounds.
team.paragraph3: From our warehouse staff in Rawalpindi who carefully pack each order, to our delivery partners across the country who ensure safe arrival, every team member plays a crucial role in your shopping experience.
team.paragraph4: We're proud to be a Pakistani company, employing local talent and contributing to the country's growing e-commerce ecosystem. Our team reflects the diversity of Pakistan - we have staff members from Punjab, Sindh, KPK, Balochistan, and Kashmir, bringing unique perspectives and regional insights to better serve our customers.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Pakistan
commitment.paragraph1: As a Pakistani company, we're committed to contributing to our nation's digital transformation. We believe that access to quality electronics shouldn't be limited by geography or economic barriers.
commitment.paragraph2: We support local businesses by partnering with Pakistani suppliers whenever possible, provide employment opportunities in the technology sector, and contribute to the development of e-commerce infrastructure in Pakistan.
commitment.paragraph3: Our vision extends beyond just selling electronics - we want to be part of Pakistan's journey towards becoming a digitally empowered nation where technology enhances every aspect of life.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products, services, and policies

shippingTime.question: How long does standard shipping take?
shippingTime.answer: Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days within Pakistan. For international orders, delivery times vary between 7-14 business days depending on the destination.

returns.question: Can I return a product if I change my mind?
returns.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day return policy for most items. The product must be unused, in its original packaging with all tags attached. Some exclusions apply for electronics and personal care items.

trackOrder.question: How do I track my order?
trackOrder.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can enter this number on our 'Track Order' page or directly on the courier's website for real-time updates.

authenticity.question: Are your products genuine/original?
authenticity.answer: Absolutely! We source all products directly from authorized distributors and manufacturers. Every item comes with an official warranty and authenticity guarantee.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit/debit cards (Visa, MasterCard), bank transfers, cash on delivery (within Pakistan), and popular digital wallets like JazzCash and EasyPaisa.

resetPassword.question: How do I reset my account password?
resetPassword.answer: Visit the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Enter your registered email address to receive a password reset link. The link expires in 24 hours for security.

internationalShipping.question: Do you offer international shipping?
internationalShipping.answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by destination. You'll see calculated shipping costs at checkout before payment.

warranty.question: What's your warranty policy?
warranty.answer: Most electronics come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty. Warranty claims must include proof of purchase. Some items have extended warranty options available at checkout.

returnsPolicy.title: Returns & Refunds Policy
returnsPolicy.subtitle: Our hassle-free return process ensures your complete satisfaction with every purchase

policy.title: Our Return Policy
policy.paragraph1: At TechHive Pakistan, we stand behind the quality of our products. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, we offer a 30-day return policy for most items.
policy.paragraph2: Our policy is designed to be simple and customer-friendly. Whether you received a defective product, changed your mind, or ordered the wrong item, we'll work with you to make it right.

highlights.title: Key Policy Highlights:
items: Free returns for defective or incorrect items
Dedicated returns portal for easy processing
Average 3-5 business days for refund processing

initiate.title: Initiate Your Return
initiate.description: Log in to your account and visit our Returns Center or contact our customer service team to start your return.

package.title: Package Your Item
package.description: Securely pack the item in its original packaging with all accessories and include the return authorization form.

ship.title: Ship It Back
ship.description: Use the prepaid return label (if applicable) or ship to our returns center. We recommend using a trackable service.

refund.title: Receive Refund
refund.description: Once received and inspected, we'll process your refund to the original payment method within 3-5 business days.

conditions.title: Conditions & Exceptions
conditions.intro: To be eligible for a return, your item must be in the same condition you received it, with original packaging and tags attached. Some items have special return conditions:

electronics.title: Electronics
electronics.description: Must be returned within 15 days. Factory seals must be intact. Restocking fee may apply.

software.title: Software & Media
software.description: Only eligible if unopened. No returns on downloaded or activated products.

personalCare.title: Personal Care
personalCare.description: Non-returnable for hygiene reasons unless defective.

customOrders.title: Custom Orders
customOrders.description: Final sale - not eligible for return unless defective.

conditions.notice: Note: We reserve the right to refuse returns that don't meet our policy conditions or show signs of misuse.

refundTime.question: How long does it take to process my refund?
refundTime.answer: Once we receive your return, refunds are typically processed within 3-5 business days. The time it takes for the credit to appear in your account depends on your bank or card issuer.

damaged.question: What if my item is damaged or defective?
damaged.answer: We'll cover return shipping and process a full refund or replacement. Please contact us immediately and include photos of the damage.

exchange.question: Can I exchange an item instead of returning it?
exchange.answer: Yes! Visit our Returns Center to request an exchange. You'll only pay the difference if the new item costs more.

shipping.question: Who pays for return shipping?
shipping.answer: We provide free return labels for defective/wrong items. For other returns, customers are responsible for return shipping unless you selected our Premium Protection at checkout.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. Learn how we protect and handle your personal information

commitment.title: Our Privacy Commitment
commitment.intro: At TechHive Pakistan, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our services.
commitment.transparency: We believe in transparency and want you to understand exactly how your information is handled. This policy applies to all users of our website, mobile applications, and services.

principles.title: Key Privacy Principles:
items: We only collect information necessary for our services
Your data is protected with industry-standard security
You have control over your personal information
We never sell your personal data to third parties

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Name, email, phone number, shipping address, and payment information when you create an account or make a purchase.

orderInfo.title: Order Information
orderInfo.description: Purchase history, order details, product preferences, and customer service interactions to improve your experience.

technicalData.title: Technical Data
technicalData.description: IP address, browser type, device information, and website usage patterns to enhance our services and security.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.description: Essential cookies for functionality, analytics cookies for improvement, and preference cookies for personalization.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We use your information responsibly to provide and improve our services. Here's how we utilize your data:

orderProcessing.title: Order Processing
orderProcessing.description: Process payments, fulfill orders, send confirmations, and provide customer support for your purchases.

accountManagement.title: Account Management
accountManagement.description: Create and maintain your account, verify your identity, and manage your preferences and settings.

serviceImprovement.title: Service Improvement
serviceImprovement.description: Analyze usage patterns, improve our website, develop new features, and enhance user experience.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: Send order updates, respond to inquiries, provide support, and share relevant information with your consent.

howWeUse.notice: Note: We will never use your personal information for purposes other than those described in this policy without your explicit consent.

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: All data transmission is protected with SSL encryption, and sensitive information is encrypted at rest.

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.description: Limited access to personal data, regular security audits, and employee training on data protection.

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.description: Continuous monitoring for suspicious activity, fraud prevention, and security incident response.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: Adherence to data protection laws, regular policy reviews, and updates to maintain compliance.

yourRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
yourRights.intro: You have important rights regarding your personal information. We respect and support these rights:

rights.title: Your Rights Include:
rights.access: Access: Request a copy of your personal data
rights.correction: Correction: Update or correct inaccurate information
rights.deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of your data (with exceptions)
rights.portability: Portability: Receive your data in a portable format
rights.restriction: Restriction: Limit how we process your data

yourRights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information provided below. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

sellData.question: Do you sell my personal information?
sellData.answer: No, we never sell your personal information to third parties. We only share data with trusted service providers who help us operate our business, and only for the purposes described in this policy.

dataRetention.question: How long do you keep my data?
dataRetention.answer: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. When we no longer need your data, we securely delete or anonymize it.

cookies.question: Can I control cookie settings?
cookies.answer: Yes! You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality. We use cookies to enhance your experience and improve our services.

dataBreach.question: What if there's a data breach?
dataBreach.answer: In the unlikely event of a data breach, we will notify affected users within 72 hours as required by law. We have incident response procedures in place to minimize any potential impact.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: Your trusted technology partner. Learn about our terms and conditions

overview.title: Our Terms & Conditions
overview.intro: Welcome to TechHive Pakistan! These Terms of Service govern your use of our website, mobile applications, and services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms.
overview.commitment: We're committed to providing you with the best technology shopping experience while ensuring fair and transparent terms for all users. Please read these terms carefully before using our services.

onlineShopping.title: Online Shopping
onlineShopping.description: Browse and purchase technology products with secure payment processing and fast delivery options.

mobileExperience.title: Mobile Experience
mobileExperience.description: Access our services through mobile applications with optimized user experience and features.

easyReturns.title: Easy Returns
easyReturns.description: Hassle-free return process with 30-day window and multiple refund options for your convenience.

customerSupport.title: Customer Support
customerSupport.description: 24/7 customer service with multiple contact channels and dedicated support team.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.intro: As a user of TechHive, you have certain responsibilities to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience for everyone:

accountSecurity.title: Account Security
accountSecurity.description: Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials and notify us immediately of any unauthorized access.

accurateInformation.title: Accurate Information
accurateInformation.description: Provide accurate and up-to-date personal information for orders, payments, and account management.

legalCompliance.title: Legal Compliance
legalCompliance.description: Use our services in compliance with applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction.

respectfulBehavior.title: Respectful Behavior
respectfulBehavior.description: Treat our staff and other users with respect and avoid any form of harassment or abuse.

userResponsibilities.notice: Note: Violation of these responsibilities may result in account suspension or termination of services.

orderProcess.title: Order Process
orderProcess.description: Place orders through our secure platform with real-time inventory checking and order confirmation.

paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentMethods.description: Multiple secure payment options including credit cards, digital wallets, and bank transfers.

shippingDelivery.title: Shipping & Delivery
shippingDelivery.description: Fast and reliable delivery with tracking options and multiple shipping methods available.

orderConfirmation.title: Order Confirmation
orderConfirmation.description: Immediate order confirmation with detailed receipts and shipping information sent to your email.

prohibitedActivities.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.intro: To maintain a safe and fair environment, certain activities are strictly prohibited on our platform:

activities.title: Activities Not Allowed:
activities.fraudulent: Fraudulent Activities: Creating fake accounts, using stolen payment methods
activities.intellectualProperty: Intellectual Property Violations: Infringing on copyrights, trademarks, or patents
activities.systemAbuse: System Abuse: Attempting to hack, disrupt, or overload our systems
activities.harassment: Harassment: Bullying, threatening, or harassing other users or staff
activities.illegalActivities: Illegal Activities: Using our services for any unlawful purposes
activities.spam: Spam: Sending unsolicited messages or creating fake reviews

prohibitedActivities.enforcement: We reserve the right to investigate and take appropriate action against any violations, including account suspension or legal action.

cancelOrder.question: Can I cancel my order after placing it?
cancelOrder.answer: Yes, you can cancel your order within 2 hours of placement if it hasn't been processed for shipping. Contact our customer service team immediately for assistance.

defectiveProduct.question: What happens if I receive a defective product?
defectiveProduct.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for defective items. Contact us immediately, and we'll provide a prepaid return label and process a full refund or replacement.

ageRestrictions.question: Are there any age restrictions for using TechHive?
ageRestrictions.answer: You must be at least 18 years old to create an account and make purchases. Users under 18 must have parental consent and supervision.

updateAccount.question: How do I update my account information?
updateAccount.answer: You can update your account information anytime through your account settings. For security reasons, some changes may require verification.
